sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useHistory, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { toAbsoluteUrl } from "../../../../../../../../../_metronic/_helpers"; import SVG from "react-inlinesvg"; import { Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CardBody } from "../../../../../../../../../_metronic/_partials/controls"; import CircularProgress from '@material-ui/core/CircularProgress'; export default function NewPickingList() { let history = useHistory(); const location = useLocation(); const [orderList, setOrderList] = useState([]) const [productList, setProductList] = useState([]) const [pickingList, setPickingList] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { document.getElementById('full-screen-close-icon').style.display = "none"; if (location.state != undefined) { setOrderList(location.state.state) } }, []) const handleBackToListPage = () => { history.push('/inventory/stock/sales-order/picking-list'); } const openFullscreen = () => { const elem = document.getElementById("myFullScreen"); elem.classList.add("scroll-product-search"); elem.requestFullscreen(); document.getElementById('full-screen-icon').style.display = "none" document.getElementById('full-screen-close-icon').style.display = "inline-block" } const closeFullscreen = () => { const elem = document.getElementById("myFullScreen"); elem.classList.remove("scroll-product-search"); document.exitFullscreen(); document.getElementById('full-screen-icon').style.display = "inline-block" document.getElementById('full-screen-close-icon').style.display = "none" } const handleSelectOrderList = (data, number) => { let id = "id-" + number; const getId = document.getElementById(id); let radioId = "radio-id-" + number; const getRadioId = document.getElementById(radioId); if (getId.className == "mt-5 select-order-list") { getId.classList.remove('select-order-list'); getRadioId.checked = false; const temp = [...pickingList] const index = temp.findIndex(obj => obj.id === data.id) if (index > -1) { temp.splice(index, 1) setPickingList(temp) } const productListTemp = [...productList] const filterProductList = productListTemp.filter(obj=>obj.orderId === data.id) const newProductList = filterProductList.map((obj)=>{ const index = productListTemp.findIndex(productObj=>productObj.id === obj.id) if(index > -1){ productListTemp.splice(index, 1); setProductList(productListTemp) } }) } else { getId.classList.add('select-order-list'); getRadioId.checked = true; const temp = [...pickingList] temp.push(data) setPickingList(temp) const productListTemp = [...productList] const newProductList = productListTemp.concat(data.productList) setProductList(newProductList) } } const handleCancelPicking = () => { const temp = [...orderList] temp.map((obj,index)=>{ let id = "id-" + index; const getId = document.getElementById(id); let radioId = "radio-id-" + index; const getRadioId = document.getElementById(radioId); if(getId.className == "mt-5 select-order-list"){ getId.classList.remove('select-order-list'); getRadioId.checked = false; setPickingList([]) setProductList([]) } }) } return ( <>
